TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeviceSpecificControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

Docs.summary: Provides parsing support for DeviceSpecific/Choice constructs. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificControlBuilder> class is internally created and used by the page parser when parsing a [\<DeviceSpecific>](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/k20acyeh(v=vs.85)) element.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificControlBuilder> class implements the following persistence behaviors: It ignores white space directly inside the control, and it allows only a [\<Choice>](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/3tfbhf6f(v=vs.100)) element as child.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in your code.
